bg-elevated.comment: Elevated background — for floating layers (modals, popovers, dropdowns). Same as bg-document in light mode; can be lightened in dark mode to convey elevation.
Elevated background (inverse) — for floating layers (modals, popovers, dropdowns). Same as bg-document in light mode; can be lightened in dark mode to convey elevation.

transparent.comment: Fully transparent - for invisible backgrounds and borders

accent-color.comment: Form control accent color (checkboxes, radio buttons)

outline-color.comment: Focus outline color for use on tinted/dark backgrounds - opposite of outline-color
